DOC.detailed_description: Eighty patient American Society Anesthesiologists（ASA） Ⅰ-Ⅲ old 80 year randomly assign 2 group : lumbar sacral plexus block ( LS ) group 20ml 0.5 % ropivacaine lumbar plexus ( level L3-4 ) 10ml 0.5 % ropivacaine sacral plexus ; lumbar , sacral plexus paravertebral nerve block ( LSP ) group 20ml 0.5 % ropivacaine lumbar plexus ( level L3-4 ) , 10ml 0.5 % ropivacaine sacral plexus 10ml 0.5 % ropivacaine paravertebral nerve ( level L1 ) . The target-controlled propofol infusion start immediately position patient operate table . The initial target concentration 0.5μg/mL . The infusion rate adjust every 5min increase decrease target concentration 0.2μg/mL step base patient ' respiratory rate ( RR ) , blood pressure ( BP ) , heart rate ( HR ) , level sedation ( score 5 Ramsay Sedation Scale ) . The minimal , maximal , optimal target concentration , cumulative propofol dose , frequency spontaneous movement incidence associate complication record . Patients phone followup questioned activity status one year . If patient dead , date death ; survive , daily living activity question .
